metadata.feature_description: Retrieve global URL management configuration including locale settings and sorting options

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Persona Bar > Settings > SEO > URL Management
steps.expected: URL Management configuration page loads with General Settings tab visible
steps.actual: URL Management page loaded successfully showing General Settings tab with URL Rewriter and URL Redirects configuration sections

steps.action: Verify URL Rewriter configuration settings are displayed
steps.expected: URL Rewriter settings should display Standard Replacement Character, Concatenate Page URLs, Convert URLs to Lowercase, Convert Accented Characters, and Set Default Site Language options
steps.actual: All URL Rewriter settings were displayed correctly: Standard Replacement Character ('-' e.g. page-name), Concatenate Page URLs (On), Convert URLs to Lowercase (Off), Convert Accented Characters (Off), Set Default Site Language (On)

steps.action: Verify URL Redirects configuration settings are displayed
steps.expected: URL Redirects settings should display redirect options for deleted/expired/disabled pages, Redirect to Friendly URLs, and Redirect Mixed Case URLs
steps.actual: All URL Redirects settings were displayed correctly: Redirect deleted/expired/disabled pages to (404 Error selected), Redirect to Friendly URLs (On), Redirect Mixed Case URLs (Off)

steps.action: Click on Extension URL Providers tab to verify additional configuration options
steps.expected: Extension URL Providers tab should load showing available URL extension providers
steps.actual: Extension URL Providers tab loaded successfully showing two providers: 'Evoq Content Item Url Extension Provider' and 'Evoq Structured Content Visualizer Url Extension Provider', both enabled

observations: The URL Management Configuration Settings feature is located under Settings > SEO > URL Management in the Persona Bar
Configuration is organized into multiple tabs: GENERAL SETTINGS, EXTENSION URL PROVIDERS, EXPRESSIONS, and TEST URL
The GENERAL SETTINGS tab contains URL Rewriter and URL Redirects configuration sections
All configuration values are properly retrieved and displayed with current settings
Toggle switches clearly indicate On/Off states for boolean settings
Dropdown selectors are available for settings with multiple options (e.g., Standard Replacement Character)
